long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple extension that retrieves highlights from within Pocket articles, and formats them for quick export into apps like RoamResearch.

---
The JavaScript code is available (open-source) on GitHub : https://github.com/greenmeen/pocket-to-roam.
---
Custom formatting isn't available in the extension settings yet, but is in the works. If you want to customize the formatting, fork the repository and edit the bookmarklet.js file, then use the 'Load unpacked extension' feature in Chrome.
